DOC.detailed_description: Participants complete four study visit . The first visit involve completion inform consent process follow screen study eligibility . The screen consist questionnaire pertain detailed medical history , diet , physical activity , health-related quality life ( KCCQ ) . Anthropometric measure general health screening ( include heart rate , rest blood pressure , small blood ( < 15 mL ) urine sample collect ) . Volunteers meet eligibility requirement schedule screen maximal cardiopulmonary exercise test . Immediately prior exercise treadmill test , subject rest ECG blood pressure determine whether abnormality would contraindicate exercise test . Qualified subject undergo maximal cardiopulmonary exercise ( CPX ) test . Following successful completion screen CPX test , volunteer meet eligibility requirement schedule two test visit , least one week apart . At one visit , participant consume small cup beet juice concentrate , , consume placebo . Treatment double-blinded administer random order .
